data.title: Ramat Sharet Elementary School
data.meta_description: The Ramat Sharet Elementary School was a secular school serving the Ramat Sharet neighborhood. The Jerusalem Foundation supported the creation of the school’s first computer laboratory in 1989. Work included preparation of a room and acquisiton of hardware, software and course materials. data.text: The Ramat Sharet Elementary School was a secular school serving the Ramat Sharet neighborhood. The Jerusalem Foundation supported the creation of the school’s first computer laboratory in 1989. Work included preparation of a room and acquisiton of hardware, software and course materials. Due to declining enrolloment, the school later merged with the nearby Menashe Eliyashar School.
